root.name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburo: Mikan no Report
root.description: OverviewTantei Jinguuji Saburo: Mikan no Report is an adventure game developed and published by Data East for the Sega Saturn, PlayStation, PSP, and PlayStation 3 platforms.
